org.cloudifysource.dsl.utils
Class ServiceUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.dsl.utils.ServiceUtils

public final class ServiceUtils
extends Object

ServiceUtils exposes a range of methods that recipes can use in closures, including TCP port checks, HTTP requests and OS tests. The ServiceUtils is always imported into a recipe, so there is no need to add an import statement to a service recipe for it.

Since:
1.0
Author:
barakme, adaml

isPortFree

public static boolean isPortFree(int port)
Tests if a port of the localhost interface is in use.

Parameters:
port - the port number.
Returns:
true if the port is not in use, false otherwise.

arePortsFree

public static boolean arePortsFree(List<Integer> portList)
Checks that the specified ports are free.

Parameters:
portList - - list of ports to check.
Returns:
- true if all ports are free

isPortOccupied

public static boolean isPortOccupied(int port)
Checks whether the specified port is in use on the the localhost ("127.0.0.1") interface.

Parameters:
port - the port to check.
Returns:
true if in use, false otherwise.

isPortOccupied

public static boolean isPortOccupied(String host,
                                     int port)
Checks whether a specified port is occupied.

Parameters:
host - - the interface/host to test.
port - - port to check.
Returns:
- true if port is occupied.

arePortsOccupied

public static boolean arePortsOccupied(List<Integer> portList)
arePortsOccupied will repeatedly test the connection to the ports defined in the groovy configuration file to see whether the ports are open. Having all the tested ports opened means that the process has completed loading successfully and is up and running.

Parameters:
portList - list of port to check.
Returns:
true if all ports are in use, false otherwise.

isHttpURLAvailable

public static boolean isHttpURLAvailable(String url)
Executes an HTTP GET Request to the given URL, using a one second connect timeout and read timeout.

Parameters:
url - the HTTP URL.
Returns:
the HTTP return code. If an error occured while sending the request, for instance if a connection could not be made, returns 500

getDownloadUtil

public static org.cloudifysource.dsl.internal.tools.download.ResourceDownloadFacade getDownloadUtil()

Returns:

getAbsolutePUName

public static String getAbsolutePUName(String applicationName,
                                       String serviceName)
Returns the PU name for a service. Important: when changing this method you must also change the getApplicationServiceName method that extracts the service name from the absolute processing unit's name.

Parameters:
applicationName - the service's application name.
serviceName - the service name.
Returns:
the PU name.

applicationName - the application name.
Returns:
the service name.

isWindows

public static boolean isWindows()
Returns true if the current operating system is some variant of Windows.

Returns:
true if running on Windows.

getPrimaryInetAddress

public static String getPrimaryInetAddress()
Returns the primary local-host address. If the local-host interface could not be resolved, "localhost" is returned.

Returns:
the primary local-host address.
